author: RTÉ News
title: NPHET to consider new virus measures for nursing homes
description: The National Public Health Emergency Team is to consider bringing in new measures for nursing homes when it meets today.
content:
The National Public Health Emergency Team is to consider bringing in new measures for nursing homes when it meets today.
New data on Covid-19 from the Health Protection Surveillance Centre has shown that there are 22 clusters in nursing homes, and the sector… [+988 chars]
